name: 3 (brazileirobr)
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam  PUCPR 2023

In this game you are a seed, trying to grow into a tree,

You must use your roots to gather nutrients from the earth, water from underground water pools  and sun with your branches, so you can use those resources in order to  grow your tree. But beware that resources are limited until you start to contribuite towards the circle of life, and by that, i mean you must feed animals so they "fertilize" your soil
